page.title: 10E M P L O Y M E N T
page.content: Our area is essentially a farming community, but there are a few local employers.The largest company,{Forest {Fencing}at Stanford Court,is a sawmill manufacturing fencing panels. They employ 170 workers at peak times, most of whom are transported from Bromyard, Tenbury and Kidderminster. Management have good labour relations with the factory floor,recognise the TGWU,there are no union problems,but they are not strongly unionised.{J.W. Lane {Agricultural Engineers}employ 13 workers. This is a family firm on a family footing and there are no labour relation problems.{The Bridge Hotel is a family business and they also run a local shop.{C.N.Jones}is another family business running cattle lorries and buses.
